import React,{useRef}from"react";import"./contact.css";import TwitterIcon from"../../assets/twitter.png";import InstagramIcon from"../../assets/libnkedin.png";import GithubIcon from"../../assets/github.png";import emailjs from"@emailjs/browser";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Contact=function Contact(){var form=useRef();var socialMediaLinks={github:"https://github.com/akashbaviskar",linkedin:"https://www.linkedin.com/in/akash-baviskar-25508b1b1"//twitter: "https://www.twitter.com/feed/",
};function handleClick(socialMedia){var url=socialMediaLinks[socialMedia];if(url){window.open(url,"_blank");}}var sendEmail=function sendEmail(e){e.preventDefault();var email=document.getElementsByName('user_email')[0].value;var msg=document.getElementsByName('message')[0].value;if(!email||!msg||!/^[\w-\.]+@([\w-]+\.)+[\w-]{2,4}$/.test(email)){alert('Please add valid email address and your message for me..');return;}emailjs.sendForm("service_hs9wp3x","template_vr5zh1f",form.current,"D2qnJWVzKxfT51cG3").then(function(result){console.log(result.text);e.target.reset();alert("Email sent");},function(error){console.log(error.text);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"contactPage",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"contact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"contactPageTitle",children:"Contact Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"contactDesc",children:"Please fill out the from below to discuss any work opportunities."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"contactForm",ref:form,onSubmit:sendEmail,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"user_name",className:"name",placeholder:"Your Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"user_email",className:"email",placeholder:"Your Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"message",className:"msg",rows:"5",placeholder:"Your Message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"submitBtn",type:"submit",value:"Send",children:"Submit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:GithubIcon,alt:"GithubIcon",className:"Link",value:"github.com/akashbaviskar",onClick:function onClick(){handleClick("github");}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:InstagramIcon,alt:"InstagramIcon",className:"Link",value:"",onClick:function onClick(){handleClick("linkedin");}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:TwitterIcon,alt:"TwitterIcon",className:"Link",value:"",onClick:function onClick(){handleClick("twitter");}})]})]})]})});};export default Contact;
